name: Personal Server Infrastructure
paragraphs: I'm building my own server infrastructure at home to replace my cloud-based setup.

The goal is to migrate all my self-hosted services from DigitalOcean to my own hardware, giving me more control, privacy, and long-term cost savings. Once everything is running smoothly, I'll shut down my DigitalOcean droplet.
components: Intel Core i5-7th Gen Processor (up to 3.00 GHz)
next_steps: Install Ubuntu Server, migrate all self-hosted services, and decommission the DigitalOcean droplet once everything is stable.

name: NoBullFit
